title: (x) Italic sans headline in Wendy's ad - Neutraface {Tiff}
content:
anyone know what this headline font is? i feel like its an alternate version of something obvious.

thanks!

CB

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080205102548im_/http:/typophile.com/files/wendys_6532.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Vinos Orlandi redonda script - Carolingia {Mike F}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080205102548/http:/typophile.com/node/41563 "Go to previous forum topic") [Looking for any faces that have a "y" w/ a notch where the two strokes join ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080205102548/http:/typophile.com/node/41273 "Go to next forum topic")
author: cooper_black

comments.content: Neutra’s all over fast food lately. Quizno’s uses Neutra Titling on their sandwich wrappers, and there are various forms of it in some of Subway’s TV spots, too.
Well, it is \*hot\* and \*juicy\* and \*fresh\* and \*crisp\* after all. ;^)

Dude? Uh, you’re welcome babe! ;^P  
hahaha

I always wondered what that face was.

My life is complete.
